name: Chunky Candies Adventure
description:
Chunky Candies Adventure

Cast your candy hook deep and reel back as many candies as you can eat. Then slice candies right out of the sky for gold. But watch out for explosives...

*OVER 30 VARIETIES OF CANDY
* EXPLOSIVE CANDY CANES THAT STEAL YOUR CANDY
* THE DEEPER YOU GET THE BIGGER THE PRIZE
*CHECKOUT THE UNDERWATER CAMERA
* GET THE BIGGEST CATCH
* ENDLESS ENTERTAINMENT WITH CRAZY, ADORABLE, WITTY, HUMOROUS AND LOVABLE ANIMATION.

Join the App Store's most thrilling candy game!

A Universal App with HD optimized graphics for retina resolution.

CHECKOUT THE SCREENSHOTS AND SEE FOR YOURSELF!!
